attributes.action: why should members of the armed services pay tax while on active service they should pay no tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: one of the largest groups or people hit by the 10% tax feasco are our brave service personel while should they pay tax while fighting overseas and why should they pay tax on there pay used for mess fees while at home I say a fare deal for our service men and women.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
